messages.messageBody:
Wow. I love it. ^^ It looks so cool! And you don't have to scroll to the bottom of the page or hit back all the time anymore. Sugoi! Have some plushies for your effort.


---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?
Yahoo! Mail Address AutoComplete - You start. We finish.

messages.subject: SHQ.com
messages.msgSnippet: I have gradually been installing a top navigation frame for shinsengumihq.com... It looks like this http://www.shinsengumihq.com/topframe.htm I have noticed
messages.messageBody:
I have gradually been installing a top navigation frame for
shinsengumihq.com...

It looks like this
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/topframe.htm

I have noticed that we could use more:
-Movie- reviews (you can post differing opinions too)
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/film.htm
*The depiction of the Shinsengumi in various films deserve study as
you can note attempts of portraying them as humans, or exaggerated
killing machines or contains some blatant historical innaccuracies.

Many of you have seen NHK's Shinsengumi you can also comment on
certain episodes or details (for example the folktale peformed by
the Yagi father and son is the same story told in the movie GOJOE)
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/tv.htm
*your commentary is valuable

Translations and fact sheets were uploaded
(*new members* please read these pages)
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/facts.htm
and I would like to urge future contributors that they include a
personal website I can link with their names...
{for example "Masayoshi" is linked with his personal
website, "MissB" is linked to her fanfiction.net page, "Wetheril" is
linked to her Livejournal page...as long as your site is in general
rated-G} SHQ.com has been enjoying ALOT of traffic so whatever link
you give me will also receive visitors

Do you need links? then please visit http://www.shinsengumidb.com
because the database categorizes the links and gives a summary

Whatever it is you want to contribute please email shinsengumihq(a)
yahoo.com...basically if want more people to better understand the
time period and history then PLEASE give info generously...of all
our affiliate sites shinsengumihq.com has enjoyed the most hits and
is perhaps now second to Serizawa's site (*new folks please read
http://victorian.fortunecity.com/stanford/130/bio.html)

If you are writing a report you MUST include a bibliography [isbn#
of books are also helpful) and properly quote the author otherwise
you are plagiarizing [it is ILLEGAL folks].


*I have been getting messages from many new members asking some
questions concerning historical Saitou Hajime...please visit "FILES"
and read the uploaded human translations of a Japanese site. The
site http://hajime3.hp.infoseek.co.jp/index.html (formerly 3-
hajime.com) does focus on history and used textual resources. Keep
in mind that "history" may also include stories handed down by
friends and family.

secretarytocapt3
AIM Badgerturtle
who is constantly pushing back her deadline for her TMPD and Seinan
War write up (^_^)
